doc.name: HSMMTimeAwareMultinomialEstimator
doc.description: A parameter estimator for a Hidden Semi-Markov Model with Multinomial Emissions. The transition probability matrix is estimated on an hourly basis.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.port: Array of observation timestamps as UNIX timestamps.
Array of estimated probability transition matrices for each hour.
doc.property: Transition Matrix partitioning options. Force self transition asserts a self transition with probability 1 if no information has been learned for the state. Interpolate: Assigns uniform probabilities to any state that has Hamming distance less than two to the current state.
